campus_resources.name: Health and Wellness Centre
campus_resources.des: Confidential mental health and physical health services provided by an interdisciplinary team of health professionals.

campus_resources.name: Accessibility Services
campus_resources.des: Confidential service helps students to navigate their disability and related barriers and provides peer support.

campus_resources.name: Academic Success
campus_resources.des: Help with navigating the university, building academic skills, staying focused and organized, and flourishing.

campus_resources.name: Sexual & Gender Diversity Office
campus_resources.des: Develops parternships to build supportive learning and working communities at the University of Toronto by working towards equity and challenging discrimination.

campus_resources.name: Anti-Racism & Cultural Diversity Office
campus_resources.des: Provides assistance and managing confidential concerns and complaints of discrimination and/or harassment based on race, ancestry, place of origin, colour, ethnic origin, citizenship, and/or creed.

campus_resources.name: Sexual Violence Prevention & Support Centre
campus_resources.des: The Centre facilitates access to support, services and accommodations for students, staff and faculty members who have experienced sexual violence.

campus_resources.name: Good2Talk Student Helpline
campus_resources.des: Professional counselling, information and referrals helpline for mental health, addictions and students well-being.

campus_resources.name: Indigenous Student Services
campus_resources.des: First Nations House provides culturally relevant services to Indigenous students in support of academic success, personal growth and leadership development.

campus_resources.name: Community Safety Office
campus_resources.des: First Nations House provides culturally relevant services to Indigenous students in support of academic success, personal growth and leadership development.

campus_resources.name: Centre for International Experiences
campus_resources.des: A diverse community of international students coming to UofT and domestic students looking to go abraod.

campus_resources.name: Multi-Faith Centre
campus_resources.des: Supports the spiritual well-being of students, staff and faculty and increases our understanding of and respect for religious beliefs and practices.

campus_resources.name: Housing
campus_resources.des: Housing Services offers the information, resources, and support you need to meet your housing goals.

campus_resources.name: TravelSmart
campus_resources.des: Student staff working in pairs (one male and one female) will escort you anywhere on campus or to a subway station.

campus_resources.name: Campus Police
campus_resources.des: Provides prgorams on personal safety, protection of property, conflict resolution, maintenance of public order, community service and referral, crime prevention and detection.

community_resources.name: Sexual Assault & Domestic Violence Care Centres
community_resources.address: Women's College Hospital - 76 Grenville St., Rm 1305
community_resources.des: A comprehensive service that assists women, men, and trans people who are victims/survivors of sexual assault and domestic/intimate partner violence.

community_resources.name: Toronto Rape Crisis Centre
community_resources.des: A grassroots, women and non-binary run collective working towards a violence-free world by providing anti-oppressive, feminist peer support to survivors of sexual violence through support, education and activism.

community_resources.name: Anishnawbe Health Toronto Mental Health Crisis Line
community_resources.address: 225 Queen St. E OR 179 Gerrard St. E
community_resources.des: Improves health & wellbeing with Anishnawbe Health Toronto traditional healers, Elders and medicine people, and other health professionals.

community_resources.name: Drug & Alcohol Helpline
community_resources.des: Provides confidential and free information about drug and alcohol addiction services in Ontario.

community_resources.name: Assaulted Women's Helpline
community_resources.des: Offers a 24-hour teleophone and TTY crisis line to all women who have experienced abuse.

community_resources.name: Distress Centres
community_resources.des: Provides crisis, emotional support and suicide prevention + intervention + postvention services to individuals in our community.

community_resources.name: LGBTQ Youthline
community_resources.des: Confidential, non-judgmental & informed LGBTTQQ2SI pper support.

community_resources.name: Gerstein Centre Mental Health Crisis Line
community_resources.des: Provides mental health crisis support, strategis for addressing immediate problems, and connections to services offering ongoing support.

covid_resources.name: Fall 2020 UofT Information
covid_resources.des: General Information about student life on campus this Fall semester

covid_resources.name: COVID-19 Information for Students - Office of the Vice Provost
covid_resources.des: General Information and common questions & answers about student life on campus this Fall semester
